name: openreads
description: OpenReads is a self-hosted reading tracker that lets users track reading progress, manage book lists, and log reading habits. It features a clean, intuitive web interface built for reading enthusiasts.
features: Reading progress: Track current page or percentage completion for books in progress with visual indicators.
Book lists: Organize titles into custom shelves like to-read, currently reading, and finished for library management.
Reading statistics: View metrics on books completed, pages read, and reading pace over time with charts.
Book metadata: Store details including author, genre, publication date, and cover images for comprehensive cataloging.
Reading goals: Set annual targets for books or pages and monitor progress toward completion throughout the year.
Notes and ratings: Add personal reviews, ratings, and reading notes to remember thoughts about each book.
Search and filter: Find books quickly by title, author, or genre with sorting options for large collections.
Import and export: Transfer reading data between devices or backup your library using standard file formats.
